CREATE TABLE descriptor_change_suggestion ( key SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, collection_key UUID REFERENCES collection(key) ON DELETE CASCADE, descriptor_group_key INTEGER REFERENCES collection_descriptor_group(key) ON DELETE CASCADE, type enum_change_suggestion_type NOT NULL, -- CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE status enum_change_suggestion_status NOT NULL DEFAULT 'PENDING', -- PENDING, APPROVED, DISCARDED suggested_file TEXT, title TEXT, description TEXT, format TEXT, proposed TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), proposed_by VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (assert_min_length(proposed_by, 3)), proposer_email VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (assert_min_length(proposer_email, 3)), applied TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, applied_by VARCHAR CHECK (assert_min_length(applied_by, 3)), discarded TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, discarded_by VARCHAR CHECK (assert_min_length(discarded_by, 3)), comments TEXT[], modified TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE, modified_by VARCHAR CHECK (assert_min_length(modified_by, 3)) );
CREATE TYPE export_format_enum AS ENUM ( 'CSV', -- Comma separated 'TSV' -- Tab separated );
